name: cfgridcolumn
description:
Used with the cfgrid tag in a cfform. Use this tag to specify
 column data in a cfgrid control. The font and alignment
 attributes used in cfgridcolumn override global font or
 alignment settings defined in cfgrid.
discouraged: The use of tags generating UI is generally discouraged by the CFML community. See: https://static.raymondcamden.com/cfuitherightway/cfgrid/index.html

params.name: name
params.description:
Name of grid column element. If grid uses a query, column
 name must specify name of a query column.

params.name: header
params.description: Column header text. Used only if cfgrid colHeaders = "Yes".

params.name: width
params.description: Column width, in pixels.

params.name: font
params.description: Font of data in column.

params.name: fontsize
params.description: Size of text in column.

params.name: italic
params.description: Yes: displays grid control text in italics

params.name: bold
params.description: Yes: displays grid control text in bold

params.name: bgcolor
params.description:
Background color of control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: textcolor
params.description:
Text color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: href
params.description:
URL o r query column name that contains a URL to hyperlink
 each grid column with.

params.name: hrefkey
params.description:
The query column to use for the value appended to the href
 URL of each column, instead of the column's value.

params.name: target
params.description: Frame in which to open link specified in href.

params.name: select
params.description: Yes: user can select the column in grid control.

params.name: display
params.description: No: hides column

params.name: type
params.description:
image: grid displays image that corresponds to value in
 column (a built-in CFML image name, or an image in
 cfide\classes directory or subdirectory referenced with
 relative URL). If image is larger than column cell, it is
 clipped to fit. Built-in image names

params.name: headerfont
params.description: Font of data in column.

params.name: headerfontsize
params.description: Size of text in column.

params.name: headeritalic
params.description: Yes: displays grid control text in italics

params.name: headerbold
params.description: Yes: displays grid control text in bold

params.name: headertextcolor
params.description:
Text color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: dataalign
params.description: Column data alignment

params.name: headeralign
params.description: Column header text alignment

params.name: numberformat
params.description:
Format for displaying numeric data in grid. See
 numberFormat mask characters.

params.name: values
params.description:
Formats cells in column as drop-down list boxes; specify
 items in drop-down list. Example:
 values = "arthur, scott, charles, 1-20, mabel"

params.name: valuesdisplay
params.description:
Maps elements in values attribute to string to display in
 drop-down list. Delimited strings and/or numeric range(s).

params.name: valuesdelimiter
params.description:
Maps elements in values attribute to string to display in
 drop-down list. Delimited strings and/or numeric range(s).

params.name: mask
params.description:
A mask pattern that controls the character pattern
 that the form displays or allows users to input and
 sends to ColdFusion.
 For currency type data, use currency symbol.
 For text or numeric type data use:
 - A = [A-Za-z]
 - X = [A-Za-z0-9]
 - 9 = [0-9]
 - ? = Any character
 - all other = the literal character
 For date type data use datetime masks.

params.name: headerIcon
params.description: Header Icon for grid column
